sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Line
    :chart-options="chartOptions"
    :chart-data="chartData"
    :chart-id="chartId"
    :dataset-id-key="datasetIdKey"
    :plugins="plugins"
    :css-classes="cssClasses"
    :styles="styles"
    :width="width"
    :height="height"
    />
</template>


<script>
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'


import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  LineElement,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  CategoryScale
} from 'chart.js'

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  LineElement,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  CategoryScale
)

export default {
  name: 'LineChart',
  components: {
    Line
  },
  props: {
    chartId: {
      type: String,
      default: 'line-chart'
    },
    width: {
      type: Number,
      default: 400
    },
    height: {
      type: Number,
      default: 400
    },
    cssClasses: {
      default: '',
      type: String
    },
    styles: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {}
    },
    plugins: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      sales: this.$store.state.statisticsMonth,
      har: [0, 0, 20, 177, 211, 95, 15, 10, 0, 0, 50, 89],

      ship: [0, 0, 10, 90, 50, 214, 0, 50, 0, 10, 100, 89],

      sale: this.sales,

      inven: new Array(12),

    chartData: {
      labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'],
      datasets: [
        {
          label: 'Inventory',
          backgroundColor: 'dark',
          data: inven
        },
        {
          label: 'Harvest',
          backgroundColor: 'blue',
          data: har
        },
        {
          label: 'Shipment',
          backgroundColor: 'red',
          data: sale
        }
      ]
    },

    chartOptions: {
      responsive: true,
      maintainAspectRatio: false
    }
    }
  }
}

</script>


<style lang=""></style>
